page.title: 11SPECIAL HOUSING
page.content: {Social Concerns }Special Housing -------------------------------------- During a County Council housing development in the area, some eight years ago, special arrangements were made for the rehousing of a family with a{handicapped}teenager. A special bungalow was built.This enabled the teenage boy to be as{independent}as possible.Toilets and sinks were adapted for easy access and use from a{wheelchair}. When the family had lived in a house this was impossible.The boy had to be lifted up and down stairs by his parents. The boy also has a special motorised car. This was given to him following a special fund raising event. --------------------------------------
